BACKGROUND.szDescription: Enter a description here. This will show up in the laptop and can be up to 256 letters long.
Militant veterans of the ANC's struggle were not only versed in jungle warfare, but also in political theory.
Travel to virgin soil, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
An imposing sight on the battlefield, Grizzly is never one to shy away from taking the enemy head-on.
Working day and night in her car repair shop when she's not travelling around the world, Vicky is a very versed mechanic. But she never overcame her fear of heights.
The difference to MacGyver is that Trevor does use guns . . . and bombs.
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?
Ivan's training program is the stuff of nightmares, but it pays off evidently.
Just because it involves no shooting, it doesn't have to be less dangerous.
Serving in the Russian campaign in Chechnya, Igor is used to harsh environments.
The Rangers form the elite of US army infantry.
A sapper can make only two mistakes in his life. The first one is a career choice.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Wether you call them terrorists or freedom fighters often depends on your relation to those killed.
This is a grim business, and combat medics are valuable personnel -- Fox is priceless.
Some people join this business not out of necessity. While easy to label them as sissy aristocrats, some are actually quite capable, as they have received the best training money can buy.
Your exploits earned you respect and recognition you deserve. Who needs legs?
That combination creates an impressive resume.
Just like boyscouts. But with violence. So not like boyscouts at all.
Like a surgeon... cutting for the very first time... Just kidding. Spider is THE person to seek if your guts are spilling out.
Cliff is a highly qualified doctor, though there once was a... darker... time in his life.
When your constabulary is an army camp or AO, and your criminals are professional soldiers, you better have the muscle to enforce your laws.
This might be Frank's last tour - there are several private organisations that are interested in recruiting him to train their staff.
Turned down by her big love, Buzz is currently filled with a lot of hatred She chose the right job it seems.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blasting sounds, fireworks, screaming people - isn't it odd how similar the stage is to the battlefield?
The Green Berets are a special operations force tasked with unconventional warfare.
If you want to put your life at risk, might as well earn cash with it.
When offered to take it or leave it, you always chose 'take'.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change, hopefully.
Dr. Q is trained in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) and martial artist. Not the fastest way to cure a patient, but it works.
Becoming a mercenary is a natural step for many gang members the job's the same, tools and pay much better.
Who needs an exam to be a practicing healer?

The british Special Air Service is one of the world's most famous special forces units, and is not only trained in survival techniques in all environments, it is also exceptionally well versed in airborne missions.
Just like boyscouts. But with violence. So not like boyscouts at all.
Fresh out of school, with diploma still warm in a hand, it's time for MD to finally make a living.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Childhood has left Biff with significant personal issues that have yet to be resolved.
Choose the awesome life of a mercenary, visit new places, meet new people, kill them, and even GET PAID for it.
Overalls, straw sticking out of boots and inseparable blade of grass in the mouth - but with a knack for tools and all things mechanical.
There is something extremely not right here, but he has obviously useful talents for this business.
Knowledge learned in years of keeping the books for an arms dealer leads to better deals when buying and selling guns and gear.
Most of his knowledge comes from books and secondhand reports - but it didn't prepare him for the grim reality of a war zone as well as he thought.
Given the nature of todays drugs, addicts can make fearsome, yet unreliable, opponents.
This... this is it! I get it now. HEAR THAT? I GET IT NOW!
Flunked out of the military academy, but not yet finished.
Turning the urban environment into a jungle is a tough job, but somebody's gotta do it!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
The only hope left for his oppressed people, Miguel IS the revolution.
When offered to take it or leave it, you always chose 'take'.
Time and youth are fleeting, so after children she took up a worthwhile trade.
Kills quarry for pelts or bounty, using whatever weapon is at hand, or what nature provides.
Michael can not only obliterate obstacles or targets but can also buy, sell or supply the same explosives required for such a job.
Not needed!
Once the bomb goes off you're already on the other side of town.
Nobody admits it, but the same governments that hunt him employed him.
He escaped the ghetto and gangbangers by putting his engineering skills on the market, and ended up in Arulco.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left him scarred for the rest of his life. This burden has only tempered his resolve.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left him scarred for the rest of his life. You've come a long way from being a party trickster playing knife throwing games.
Nobody fails his classes ...and lives!
To heal or to hack? Only how he wields a scalpel decides the outcome.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Once a juvenile delinquent, now a rebel with a cause.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left him scarred for life. He's no longer afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
His laid-back sense of humor sometimes belies the fact his threatening demeanor works wonders when getting things he or others want.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
Living the life of an evil ruler of a small country certainly leads to astonishing survival talents.
Old people. They never seem to sleep.
You excel at political influence, strategy and tactics, but as a mercenary you leave a lot to be desired.
Sort of like a Big Game Hunter, only people.
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back while under fire is a quest for the best!
Do you wonder why Rat is a bit on the nervous side?
Notorious mass-murderer? Insane criminal? They're just jealous.
Wanted by Interpol, a meat cleaver murderer, and master of disguise.
When the Confederacy lost the war your family moved further south... and is still fighting...everybody!
Turning the urban environment into a jungle is a tough job, but somebody's gotta do it!
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
You don't want to know.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
And there goes the Geneva convention...
You know the risk selling weapons to both sides, but the profit margin is just that good.
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change, hopefully.
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Travel to virgin soil, seek rare species, kill them, and SELL THEIR BODYPARTS.
Flying helicopters is second nature to him, as is getting the heck out of trouble!
Pablo 'takes care of' the cargo coming in and going out of the Drassen airport.
Sal tries to handle the cargo manager job.
Gets the story . . . or makes one up . . . whatever it takes.
Look at this guy. Now look at you. Still feel like escaping?
Former law enforcement personnel often seek work in the mercenary world, and are the logical choice for handling captives.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some look to explosives for emotional release.
Pleasing customers in a most unsavory way while keeping her charges captive.
Respected for his wisdom and knowledge of Arulcan history.
Wheelchair-bound, this former rebel has seen better days.
Mess with him, you mess with the entire family...
Paranoid, ignorant, fascist - yep, that's you.
Paranoid, ignorant, communist - yep, that's you.
Jake deals in junk . . . and other stuff.
This is your country, your land, your people, and you have pledged your life to free them.
Dave used to run a service station . . . when there was fuel for vehicles.
The Queen had Skipper's family murdered, and his home burned to the ground.
Not needed!
Subscribing to Soldier of Fortune magazine is as close to being a mercenary as you ever came . . . until now.
Could you take a picture, please?
This mercenary General is definitely not in your squad!
Drafted into the Arulcan Army, this sergeant would rather be home with his family.
Rich classist bankrolling the Queen for social status.
You have a good knowledge of hydraulic engineering and main hydraulic processes.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
In his prime, he'd have put all you youngsters to shame.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Got something that needs fixing? Here's your man.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to the grim business.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Political expertise is your specialty.
One would expect a constant abuse and ridicule you withstand to finally lead you to reconsidering your life choices. Nope.
Not needed!
Not needed!
The best (and likely only) heli mechanic in Arulco.
Oppressor of the weak and infirm, all bravado and no bravery.
A veteran of international conflict, Iggy found himself on the wrong side of the conflict until he joined the rebellion.
You are a warlord, a mastermind, an evil genius, a nemesis who always finds a way to escape death.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
It takes guts to jump out of a plane to face numerically superior foes.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Pursuing your insatiable appetite for knowledge led you into commiting atrocities for The Queen, which you now seek to rectify.
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. You have learned to use martial arts to relieve the stress.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Rich classist and greedily evil CEO who will stop at nothing in pursuit of profit.
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
Poor Manny...
Working on an oil rig is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. So you snitched and bluffed your way into the office.
Working on an oil rig is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Whether it's thirty years old junk or the latest electronic gadget, tech whiz can rewire, reassemble and reconfigure it with eyes closed.

Nations provide these troops to solve conflicts without any violence. Sadly, this statment is false -- which is why Gaston is also a sniper.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Target of thrown popcorn in cinemas around the world, scoffed by critics yet adored by loyal fans.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
Not needed!

Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Leaving your homeland has left you bitter. Learning to cut human flesh relieved your pain.
Let's hope you are as good evading bullets as you are evading knifes while tied to a board.
Formed after the disastrous Munich massacre in 1972, GSG9 is a counter-terrorism unit.
Placeholder
Explosives experts are hard to find . . . but everyone wishes they hadn't found this one!
You know all about your teammates, wether or not they care.
It might be more of a spectacle than actual fight, but getting thrown around a ring without breaking a neck still takes a lot of skill.

Several years of evaluating human lives ironically left your own health in disrepair - cheap cigarrettes flushed down with strong coffee took their toll. The object-like way you started to treat your patients also doesn't make you very popular.
When you've seen it all, nothing can frighten you anymore.
Due to extreme shortsightedness Wally is a poor shot with next to no chance of improvement.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
Versatile and educated doctor can save a human life no matter what his patient caught - a virus or a bullet.
Air conditioning, watered down coffee and some papers to push - what else can you expect from life?
When they said "those who can, do; those who can't, teach" - they were talking about Lance.
Pretending to be anything and everything he is not, nobody knows who he actually is.
If your team ever needs someone to throw grenades on an even field, you'll be the man.
No matter if it's a thirty years old junk or latest electronic gadget, tech whiz can rewire, reassemble and reconfigure it with eyes closed.

The indigenous people of Metavira have adjusted to the hostile jungle there. After the liberation, some joined the foreigners, and sought their luck elsewhere.

Leaders of their communities since ages long forgotten, shamans posess medical knowledge unknown to western eyes.

You have no moral compass and will cheat everyone out of everything they have while blaming them for their misfortune.
Former convenience store owner who's diversified into farming

You use a mix of street smarts, cultural knowledge, language proficiency and subject matter expertise in order to spot, assess, develop, recruit and handle individuals you believe have access to vital information.
You are a beast of a man with the subtlety of a large bulldozer and an equally gargantuan hatred of everything Arulcan and the west.
Years of intense physical practice and match day performance will certainly help you make those last-ditch efforts to survive.
Rooftops and shadows are your best friend.

Through rain, snow, sleet and hail the mail must get through - and IT NEVER STOPS!

You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.

Spam was frustrated by the lack of a strong mandate that forced him to do nothing. On the plus side, he is used to being fired at.

You make things go BOOM!

When you want to break enemy morale by blowing up his privy, it's time to get yourself a qualified pyrotechnician.

Disco is not dead! Not yet anyway.
The phrase show me the money may have been coined by Hollywood but you've been using it far longer.
A dose of the right stuff can turn any mild mannered individual into a vicious killer. You're walking proof of this.
You've spent all your life on the hustle. Then you realised that life is one big hustle.
Just like a normal hunter but only half as good.
Cowboy's frontier approach to medicine earned him a non-spurred boot from med school faster than he could quick-draw.
